[Link to tweet] Ron Filipkowski This is a travesty. Trump rants 45 minutes straight about Harris from his golf course, he has a cheering section, now hes calling on right-wing people to ask him questions. Any media who covers another one of these live is a joke. This is a travesty. Trump rants 45 minutes straight about Harris from his golf course, he has a cheering section, now hes calling on right-wing people to ask him questions. Any media who covers another one of these live is a joke.
